Comfort & Convenience Exterior Interior Performance Technology & Safety
Comfort & Convenience

  • Leather interior upholstery
  • Heated front seats
Exterior
  • 19" Poseidone wheels 
                 -  Front: 245/45 R19
                 - Rear: 275/40 R19

  • Chromeline exterior trim
                 -  Ghibli badge, door handles, Saetta logo on C pillar, side air vents  and daylight opening
  • Heated, power-adjustable and foldable door mirrors with integrated LED turn lights
  • Lightweight trunk lid with keyless opening
Interior
  • Heated rear window
  • 60/40 folding rear seat
  •  Auto-dimming interior rearview mirror including Automatic High Beam Assist
  • Dark Mirror interior trim 
                 -  Front tunnel and door inserts

  • Trident logo embossed on front and rear headrests
Performance
  • ZF 8-speed automatic transmission
  • 3.0L twin-turbo V6 engine with 345 hp and 369 lb-ft torque
  • Sport Mode
                 -  Accelerator map, engine, Maserati Stability Program, exhaust, transmission
Technology & Safety
  • Maserati Stability Program (MSP) 
                 -  Acceleration Slip Regulation (ASR)
                 -  Antilock Braking System (ABS)
                 -  Electronic Brake Distribution (EBD)
                 -  Drive wheels locking prevention (MSR)
  • Power-assisted steering with Speed Sensitive feature
  • Automatic headlamp activation
  • Brake Assist System (BAS)
  • Rearview camera with dynamic gridlines
  • Black leather multifunction steering wheel
  • Rain sensor
  • Tire Pressure Monitoring System (TPMS)
  • Cruise control
  • Front and rear parking sensors
  • Anti-pinch sensor for windows
  • Push button start
  • External temperature sensor
  • Engine Start/Stop
  • Front brakes: 
                 -  4-piston aluminum monobloc fixed calipers with ventilated discs (345 mm x 28 mm)
  • Rear brakes: 
                 -  Floating calipers with ventilated discs (330 mm x 22 mm)
  • Aluminum key fob with keyless entry and go 
  • Leather gear selector with Manual mode activation and parking button

Comfort & Convenience
  • 12-way power comfort front seats with 2-position driver memory
  • Extended leather interior upholstery
  • Sunroof
  • Heated front seats
  • Front armrest with twin mechanical opening
                 - Includes air conditioned and illuminated storage compartment with two cup holders and 12V socket
  • Soft Close Doors
Exterior
  • 19" all-season tires
  • 19" Poseidone wheels
               - Front: 245/45 R19
               - Rear: 275/40 R19
  • 18" Space Saver spare wheel
  • Bi-xenon headlamps with integrated DRL LED lights; LED tail lamps and third brake light
  • Chromeline exterior trim
               - Ghibli badge, door handles, Saetta logo on C pillar, side air vents and daylight opening
  • Heated, power-adjustable and foldable door mirrors with integrated LED  turn lights
  • Lightweight trunk lid with keyless opening
Interior
  • Heated rear window
  • 60/40 folding rear seat
  • Maserati clock on dashboard with chrome-plated trim
  • Auto-dimming interior rearview mirror including Automatic High Beam  Assist
  • 12V socket in rear trunk
  • Lateral cargo net for trunk
  • Electrically lockable glove box
  • Dark Mirror interior trim
               - Front tunnel and door inserts
               - Two open cup holders and lighter
  • Trident logo embossed on front and rear headrests
  • Heated Black Leather Sport Steering Wheel 
Performance
  • ZF 8-speed automatic transmission
  • Q4 Intelligent All-Wheel Drive (AWD) with Active Torque Control
  • Front active differential for Q4 all-wheel-drive system
  • Electric Power Steering (EPS)
  • Limited-slip differential
  • 3.0L twin-turbo V6 engine with 424 hp and 428 lb-ft torque
  • Sport Mode
                 - Accelerator map, engine, Maserati Stability Program, exhaust,    transmission
  • Twin dual-pipe exhaust system in chrome-plated stainless steel
Technology & Safety
  • Maserati Stability Program (MSP)
                 - Acceleration Slip Regulation (ASR)
                 - Antilock Braking System (ABS)
                 - Electronic Brake Distribution (EBD)
                 - Drive wheels locking prevention (MSR)
  • Power-assisted steering with Speed Sensitive feature
  • Automatic headlamp activation
  • Brake Assist System (BAS)
  • Alarm system
  • Rearview camera with dynamic gridlines
  • Black leather multifunction steering wheel
  • Rain sensor
  • Tire Pressure Monitoring System (TPMS)
  • HomeLink® garage door opener
  • Cruise control
  • Instrument cluster dials in Maserati Blue color
                 - White backlighting
                 - 7" multifunction display
  • Front and rear parking sensors
  • Anti-pinch sensor for windows
  • Push button start
  • External temperature sensor
  • Engine Start/Stop 
  • Remote start
  • 8-speaker, 280-watt Maserati sound system
  • Front brakes:
                 - 6-piston aluminum monobloc fixed calipers with dual-cast ventilated drilled discs (360 mm x 32 mm)
  • Rear brakes:
                 - 4-piston aluminum monobloc fixed calipers with ventilated drilled discs (345 mm x 28 mm)
  • Easy Entry
  • Aluminum key fob with keyless entry and go 
  • Integrated Vehicle Control (IVC)
  • Leather gear selector with Manual mode activation and parking button
  • Maserati Active Sound System
  • Maserati Touch Control Plus (MTC+) with Navigation
                 - 8.4" touchscreen display with rotary control
                 - Radio, Bluetooth®, USB, Aux-in, Apple CarPlay® and Android Auto™,climate controls, phone devices, car setup, etc.
  • Apple CarPlay® with Siri® personal assistant
  • Blind Spot Detection
